oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup Aired Performance - 1946-09-28 - KOMA - Part 1 - Oklahoma City Municipal Auditorium
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part one of an aired performance from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program on September 28, 1946 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla). Staff includes Hiram Higsby (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), and Kenyon Brown (producer). Performance was live at the Oklahoma City Municipal Auditorium.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chuck Davis; Roundup Boys; Hiram Higsby; Homegrown Trio; Mary Lou; Dick Reinhart
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) [Blank] / (0:24) Opening statements and theme / (1:45) Hiram Higsby talks about the National Miss American Veteran Contest / (2:20) Chuck Davis and the Roundup Boys perform "Mama Don’t Allow" / (4:24) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (6:18) Hiram Higsby performs "Daisy Put On The Coffeepot I’m Coming Home" / (8:45) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (9:33) The Homegrown Trio performs "Little Liza Jane" / (11:11) Hiram Higsby tells a joke / (11:42) Mary Lou performs "There’s A Love Knot In My Lariat" / (13:34) Hiram Higsby tells a joke / (14:04) Dick Reinhart performs "Sioux City Sue"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); CBS Inc.; Davis, Chuck; Higsby, Hiram, 1909-1975; Reinhart, Dick;
